name: VR DEMO ZOMBIE MAZE
description:
In this demo game , the game play is to avoid zombies that are folowing 
you inside a big Maze and you have to kill them one by one , this is a 
very  exciting immersion in VR .
This demo game has been developed for VR, you could use it for any Vr
glasses such as Gear VR, google card board and others, I hope you will
enjoy this demo and please leave comments to encourage me to continue
to develope it .
